ComicInfo.Title: As the Trend Towards Violence Increases; If Comic Strip Characters Had to Face Simple But Realistic Problems!; Black Thoughts; Future Automated Devices; Cracked's Gallery of Born Losers; It Happened at the Cemetery; The Magician and the Man from the Audience!; The Cracked TV Sports Primer; What Really Happens During the Filming of Television Commercials!; The Cracked Museum of Historical Trivia; The Growing Garbage Garble
ComicInfo.Summary: British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:42:01. [Issue ID 250430]

ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,Lugoze,John Severin,Caracu,Art Pottier,Tony Tallarico,Bill Ward,Arnoldo Franchioni
